• Large 50mm dynamic drivers
• Plush memory foam ear cushions

product_details.name: Premium Studio Pro Wireless Headphones - Immersive Sound Experience
product_details.description:
• Large 50mm dynamic drivers for superior sound quality
• Plush memory foam ear cushions for extended comfort
• Professional-grade noise isolation design
• Adjustable padded headband for perfect fit
• Premium black leather and metal construction
• Swivel ear cups for DJ-style monitoring
• High-quality wireless connectivity with minimal latency
• Extended battery life for long listening sessions
• Studio-grade sound reproduction for professionals
• Foldable design for easy storage and portability
• Deep, rich bass response with crystal clear highs
• Compatible with all Bluetooth-enabled devices

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern and bold design with a strong emphasis on product marketing. The background is a layered composition using dark navy and blackish-blue tones accented by diagonal golden lines and faint circular gradients, establishing a high-tech and premium feel. The headline text (id: "heading") is large, bold, and colored in bright yellow for high visibility. Below it, a striking promotional tagline (id: "tagline") is styled in clean white to contrast the dark backdrop. A feature list (id: "description") follows in a concise bullet format. The price highlight (id: "price") is vivid and centrally positioned in yellow, while the CTA button (id: "cta_background" and "cta") uses the same yellow with dark blue text to draw immediate attention. A sleek product image (id: "product_image") of headphones is prominently placed on the right, balancing the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy: #1A2F50
- Deep Blue-Black: #091428
- Golden Yellow: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
- Accent Shadow (Gold overlays): rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1 - 0.5)
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, over-ear headphones with a modern and sophisticated design. The dominant color is a deep metallic black (#1C1C1E), giving the product a premium, high-tech appearance. Subtle highlights in gunmetal gray (#3A3B3C) and silvery blue (#AAB2BD) add depth and reflectivity, enhancing the contours and textures of the headphones. Soft shadows and gradients are used to blend these tones seamlessly, emphasizing the product's curves and build quality. A color palette for an advertisement banner could include: deep black (#1C1C1E), gunmetal gray (#3A3B3C), silvery blue (#AAB2BD), and glossy charcoal (#2E2E2E), reflecting both elegance and cutting-edge design.
